name: Paths Of Light
description:
**ADVISSION** 

The windows version gave a false positive for virus, idk why it happens, i double checked everything, ill post a new version builded from my other pc to see if it works, i'll upload it in a few hours. *Update* I tried to build in another pc, and still with the same issue. Im not bad intended, idk why this happens. But ill look for a solution.

This is our second game for a Game Jam, Me and my Girlfriend @lemmeneda (check her insta for more art), are 2 indie developers that enjoy making games. Check this out and leave a comment for what we could improve! Thx for reading!

Programming: Tomas Martinez

Art: Violeta Mercurio

Design and Idea: Tomas Martinez/Violeta Mercurio
